ComicInfo.Penciller: Brian Ching,Clarence Lansang,David Finch,Brian Ching,Clarence Lansang,David Finch
ComicInfo.Summary: In New-York City, Gavin Taylor is contacted by Grigorieff who seems to want to strike a deal with him about something. Then Lucien and Andromeda find out her parents are missing and that some federal agents want them dead big time. In the meantime, Petra is being drugged by Marcus who is planning to take over the throne of Minea with the help of a mysterious female being...
ComicInfo.Tags: Petra,Lucien Barnes,Marcus,Andromeda Weaver,Grigorieff,Dayaks,Mineans,Gavin Taylor,New York City
